Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people or figures who are trying to talk to each other over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone between the two people, using something like cups or cans connected by a string.
The student can show how the device uses sound to send information from one person to the other.
The student can include a simple explanation or label in the drawing showing that the string telephone is used to communicate over long distances.
The student can demonstrate that the drawing only includes materials (like string, cups, or cans) that were provided for the task.
